abstract: For technology entrepreneurs chasing opportunity, the Wall Street analyst turned venture capitalist, is still the bull: "Wow! Unprecedented times!"
snippet: For technology entrepreneurs chasing opportunity, the Wall Street analyst turned venture capitalist, is still the bull: "Wow! Unprecedented times!"
lead_paragraph: Mary Meeker, a Kleiner Perkins Caufield & Byers partner, released her latest report on "Internet Trends" on Tuesday.

headline.main: Mary Meeker on the State of the Net
